name: Rebound (itch) (rebound)
description:
Discord:  https://discord.gg/fCda8wb

Dev blog: https://reboundgame.tumblr.com/

If you wish to upload the game's OST onto YouTube then go and ask the composers and if you are granted permission to do so, you must give proper credit to the composers by linking their SoundCloud/YouTube or wherever they may upload their music.
Please refrain from uploading music that belongs to PaulPercopolis onto YouTube as they do not want it on there.
